name: Name
subject: Subject
bannerTitle: Teach online or in-person near your area
bannerDesc: We are part of the largest educational group in the Middle East when it comes to searching schools, universities, and professional courses. Now, we can help you use your knowledge, skills, hobbies, or experience to earn money by teaching or training. Be your own boss, control your time and income.
work1_desc: Tell us about yourself and what you teach, describe your expertise and knowledge, upload your professional or academic certificates, set your availability and rate.
work2_desc: We will help anyone who wants to learn new languages, school and university subjects, hobbies, sports and art to find you online based on your profile, skills, availability and rate
work3_desc: Your booking is confirmed via our website for slots of either 5, 10, 15 or 20 hours based on your availability. You have the choice to deliver the lessons online or in person.
work4_desc: Students pay upfront for the lessons, so you are guaranteed payment, we will pay you weekly or monthly via PayPal or bank transfer.
about_desc: Molamy.com is part of the largest educational group in the Middle East for searching and booking language courses, professional training, and academic programs. It has an extensive brand portfolio that includes more than 350 language schools, over 1,100 higher education providers, and over 2,000 professional teachers spread across 20 countries. With a site traffic of over 3,000 visitors daily, our online presence allows us to generate numerous potential students. Moalemy.com allows professionals to use their knowledge, skills, hobbies, or experience to teach online or in-person and earn money. For more information about who we are and what we do About Molamy.com
downloadDesc: For easy & quick booking,instant messages & notification

tsmDesc: More than 10,000 students have benefited from the Moalemy platform
reasonTitle: What are the reasons that make you book with us in Moalemy?
reasonDesc: Global guarantee. Fame, diversity in specializations, services and high technologies
r1_title: If your tutor is not suitable, your lesson is free
r1_desc: We guarantee that you will find the right tutor. If you are not satisfied, you can request a 100% refund of the fees after your first lesson with any teacher
r2_desc: We have over 2,000 experienced teachers and coaches ready to help you
r3_title: A global website from an accredited company
r3_desc: The educational and training group is the largest in the Middle East and also includes yesatlas.com, Findcourse.com
r4_desc: We have more than 150 majors and skills that cover all aspects of your interest and studies
r5_desc: We have several offices and a team equipped to serve clients from Saudi Arabia, UAE, Kuwait and Jordan
r6_title: The best platform of its kind in the Arab world
r6_desc: The platform was specially designed to suit the skills required in the Arab labor market and the education system in the Middle East
join_title: Do you have the desire to become a teacher or trainer through the Internet?
join_desc: Join the team of trainers and share your skills and experience to earn extra money by teaching or training online or face-to-face in your area. We are the largest group in the Middle East for searching and direct booking of language courses and training courses and applying to universities around the world.
typeStudent: Which students want to teach and train?
rating_desc: Evaluation is done only by students of the teacher
parent_desc: We are pleased to facilitate the process of following up your children's studies
aboutus_desc: Moalemy is an Arabic digital platform that specializes in helping students with assignments, preparing for tests, and booking virtual private lessons using innovative digital methods. Where students were able to seek help immediately from certified and highly qualified teachers.
terms_use_desc: All materials published on this site are subject to copyright owned by the site of Moalemy, ie reproduction, retransmission, or republishing. By using or participating in this website, you have read these terms and agree to be bound by them. If you do not agree to be bound by them, please exit the site
terms_service_desc: We operate as an advanced online platform connecting students and instructors in order to provide students with the ability to search and book professional courses and private lessons.
terms_service_desc2: Students are responsible for selecting the teacher appropriate to their needs. While making a booking decision, students should review and investigate the credentials, education, and experience on each teacher's profile.
q1: How can I submit a request to teach through my Moalemy website?
q1_a: You can submit your application through the website by following the steps indicated when clicking on the application link.
q2: Is it necessary for me to have a certificate that qualifies me for teaching or training for work with Moalemy ?
q2_a: No, you do not need a teaching or training certificate. But it is better to be experienced or have a degree in the fields you want to teach in order to impress students when researching
q3: What are the most important points that I must take into account in order for my application to be approved?
q3_a: Be sure to enter the details of your personal information correctly, in addition to uploading a real personal photo and writing a beautiful and clear explanation about yourself, your experiences and the methods of education that distinguish you. Follow the steps and instructions mentioned in the registration form
q4: How can I get student reservations through Moalemy ?
q4_a: Your profile will be included in the search results that will appear to students if the research topic matches the teaching topics you have chosen and your available time matches the student's time. Make sure that your file is well and correctly completed in order to get a better ranking within the search results, which increases the chance of you getting more reservations.
q5: What subjects can I teach or train students through Moalemy ?
q5_a: We have a large list of topics in various fields such as: languages, school or university curricula, sports, art, beauty, cooking, and others. You can also propose a new topic of your own through the registration request
discount_error: You Can't Put This Discount Number As a Value

privacy_desc: Welcome to the privacy policy of moalime site. This site is operated and managed by the educational authority that owns it and information technology or its affiliates. You are required to register on the site for some personal data, and we pledge to protect it and not share it with any third party. As such, we feel it necessary to disclose to you what information this website collects and tracks and what we do with the information we collect.
info_privacy_content: Certainly, logging into the website requires personal data, and we commit to using advanced security technology to prevent unauthorized access to our computers.
security_privacy: How do we protect your personal information? And what is expected of you to assist us?
security_privacy_content: At Moalime, we provide secure usage to maintain the confidentiality of your personal data. All data is sent as a highly encrypted form and is only accessed by authorized individuals who are committed to maintaining the privacy of the information. Therefore, you should provide the data transparently and clearly.
security_privacy_list: We create a clear and comprehensive privacy policy that explains how we collect and use personal information for subscribers and how we safeguard and protect that information using the HTTPS protocol to protect and encrypt communication data and sensitive information.
We train relevant employees in handling subscribers' personal information, such as privacy principles and information security.
We provide awareness materials and guidelines to subscribers on protecting their privacy and offer tips on how to protect their personal information.
privacy_edit_content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time without notice. We advise you to read and review this privacy policy regularly. Any changes to this privacy policy will be effective from the date of publication on the website.
privacy_contact_content: Please contact us if you have any inquiries regarding this privacy policy by email at info@moalime.com.
note_teacher: Note: 15% of the platform management percentage will be deducted from your profits
